annotations.annotation: A new land ordinance. See also Tribal Agricultural Land Standard Assignment (Form approved by the Secretary of the Interior June 30, 1941) and Grant of Standard Assignment (Form approved June 30, 1941 as amended by Stockbridge Munsee Resolution No. 0988, July 15, 1986); and Tribal Council meeting minutes of January 2, 1975, June 15, 1979, and April 1, 1986.
